Woman survives 30 metre fall onto rocks at Waiheke Island, flown to Auckland City Hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-survives-30m-fall-onto-rocks-at-waiheke-island-flown-to-auckland-city-hospital/T2RFDXADNRGXJE6KSGJ3TN5HIA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-survives-30m-fall-onto-rocks-at-waiheke-island-flown-to-auckland-city-hospital/T2RFDXADNRGXJE6KSGJ3TN5HIA/ The injured woman had been exploring the island's coastline when she slipped. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:21:06 +0000 The Westpac Rescue Helicopter flew a woman to Auckland City Hospital from Waiheke Island after she fell 30 metres onto rocks.

Thu, 28 Dec 2023 18:40:04 +0000 Fees-free was introduced in 2018 to increase participation and open the door to those who faced financial barriers, but it has increased inequity and numbers are falling.
